pages.text: Platyhystrix is a sailed amphibian from the Early Permian period. It resembled Edaphosaurus and Dimetrodon but was actually not related at all and was a semi aquatic amphibian. It would have been prey to larger temnospondyls such as Eryops and these animals had short sturdy legs and reached a meter in length. The sail was possibly used for thermal regulation and it also had thick hard plates on its back.
